prompt_base: photograph of Android 15, short stout humanoid, dark magenta skin tone, large neon green rimless sunglasses, oversized dark felt hat, black tuxedo
feature_prompt: smooth skin texture, subtle skin pores, reflections on the green glasses, felt texture on hat, high quality tuxedo fabric
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, neon purple skin, bright pink, flat lighting, low quality, human skin color
